preface.title: Preface
preface.para: This book is the official documentation for skit. It is currently in an early embryonic and minimal form.

Note that this is a very early (alpha) release and although it has been extensively tested, you may encounter bugs. If so, please report them at skit-general@lists.pgfoundry.org so that skit may be improved and eveyone's experience enhanced.
